title: #142: The Science of Mating and Dating With Geoffrey Miller
description: Despite romantic relationships being such a big part of our lives, nobody ever really sits you down and says, "Here's how to have a successful relationship." We're instead expected to figure it out on our own. Today's guest, Geoffrey Miller, says we're setting people up for failure by not giving them some advice. On the show we discuss the book he co-wrote with Tucker Max called "Mate."
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
